reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Development Cooperation Planning Funds for Somalia

description.narrative: Finland supports Somalia through development cooperation. The bilateral cooperation in Somalia is guided by Finland's Development Cooperation in Somalia 2017?2020 document. It focuses particularly on supporting the realisation of the rights of women and gi rls; as well as building and strengthening of the core functions of the Somali state. The document is based on the priorities identified in the Somalia's National Development Plan.The purpose of the Somalia planning funds is to improve the quality of the F innish development cooperation in Somalia. Planning funds will be used for planning preparation monitoring evaluation and auditing the Finnish development and statebuilding support in Somalia as well as to promote results-based management. Planning funds c an also be used for participating in Somalia aid coordination bodies' meetings. In addition the planning funds can be used for visits related to Finland's development policy and development cooperation with Somalia for organization of small-scale developme nt policy/cooperation related trainings and workshops as well as for development cooperation related communication. The purpose of the planning funds is to ensure that the regional department and the Embassy have adequate resources to implement results-bas ed programming in Somalia.Both the Department for Africa and the Middle East as well as the Embassy in Nairobi can use the planning funds. The allocation for the planning funds is 180.000?.
